title: All 9 players in the game verbally abused me.
body: Every single person in the game verbally abused me calling me names, being racist, etc. They all said they were gonna report me for 'inting and verbal abuse'. I kept my cool, but these guys were like mad or something. I did feed, went 0-10 but was just so tilted from the chat and losing streak. Will they get punished for toxicity or does it need multiple reports for riot to do anything? I'm fairly new to the game, just started to play ranked and this community seems a bit toxic.

replies.body: your playing league of legends thee most toxic game
Will they get punished though? I've had multiple friends of mine get punished for saying almost nothing toxic.

Depends how consistently they do it, same way you prob wont get banned for basically inting.


Cause it doesn't happen everygame, all the time.. etc.



Why did all 9 verbal you? all 9 don't just randomly attack one person, what did you do?

Did have a bunch of lag spikes through out game and I was playing GP, can't do barrel combos with 200 ping (well I can't). I just said I was lagging in all chat after they called me trash, etc. It just escalated after that, calling me "%%%%%%%%%%%", etc.

ah, that's unfortunate.

But yea, more than likely they won't get in serious trouble. unless they flame consistently.

not much of the toxic stuff people say gets punished ...not even close.

but if you do say just the right stuff or nonstop flame then youll get reported and punished

1) Did you report them? If so then they may receive chat bans, game time bans or permabans if their behavior is consistently like this. 
2) If people begin to harass you, mute them. Why keep listening to them and letting them tilt you?
Punishments are given out according to severity and quantity. Players are punished swiftly for severe chat, but more slowly for less toxic chat.
